get.description:
Use this command to search Steam market and receive data in embeds 

Use `"/"` to extend query with optional arguments:
 `[count]` - number of items displayed `(0-20)`
 `[sort_column]` - column to sort by `(name, quantity, price)`
 `[sort directory]` - order in which items should be displayed `(asc, desc)`

gets.description:
Use this command to search Steam market and receive data as text 

Use `"/"` to extend query with optional arguments:
 `[count]` - number of items displayed `(0-20)`
 `[sort_column]` - column to sort by `(name, quantity, price)`
 `[sort directory]` - order in which items should be displayed `(asc, desc)`

buff.description:
Use this command to search Buff163 market and receive data in embeds 

Use `"/"` to extend query with optional arguments:
 `[count]` - number of items displayed `(0-20)`
 `[sort directory]` - order in which items should be displayed `(asc, desc)`

Buff163 only allows to sort items by price

buffs.description:
Use this command to search Buff163 market and receive data as text 

Use `"/"` to extend query with optional arguments:
 `[count]` - number of items displayed `(0-20)`
 `[sort directory]` - order in which items should be displayed `(asc, desc)`

Buff163 only allows to sort items by price

aliases.description: Use this command to get list of available aliases
